block.p: Laurie Beth Corn and Frank Powell were married last evening at the Ritz-Carlton on Amelia Island, Fla. Rabbi Michael Matuson officiated.

Mrs. Powell, 42, works in Tampa, Fla., as the group publisher for advertising of Studio/monthly, a television and movie production magazine. She graduated from Bucknell and is the daughter of Ruth Corn of Smithtown, N.Y., and the late Alan Corn.
Laurie Beth Corn and Frank Powell were married last evening at the Ritz-Carlton on Amelia Island, Fla. Rabbi Michael Matuson officiated.
Laurie Beth Corn and Frank Powell were married last evening at the Ritz-Carlton on Amelia Island, Fla. Rabbi Michael Matuson officiated.

Mrs. Powell, 42, works in Tampa, Fla., as the group publisher for advertising of Studio/monthly, a television and movie production magazine. She graduated from Bucknell and is the daughter of Ruth Corn of Smithtown, N.Y., and the late Alan Corn.

Mr. Powell, 41, also works from Tampa, operating a business called Technology Forums, which arranges events for the United States government and the military. He graduated from the University of Maryland and is a son of Sherry Powell and Frank Powell of Millersville, Md.
